## Properties

| Property  | Attribute  | Description | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | ---------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `maxSize` | `max-size` |             | `string` | `'initial'` |
| `minSize` | `min-size` |             | `string` | `'initial'` |
| `weight`  | `weight`   |             | `number` | `1`         |


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                        | Description                  |
| --------------------------- | ---------------------------- |
| `--og-layout-child--align`  | align-self behaviour         |
| `--og-layout-child--basis`  | flex-basis behaviour         |
| `--og-layout-child--grow`   | flex-grow behaviour          |
| `--og-layout-child--order`  | Order of the layout children |
| `--og-layout-child--shrink` | flex-shrink behaviour        |
